item.title: Bryce add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description: "Some day, Locke Lamora,” he said, “some day, you’re going to fuck up so magnificently, so ambitiously, so overwhelmingly that the sky will light up and the moons will spin and the gods themselves will shit comets with glee. And I just hope I’m still around to see it.” “Oh please,” said Locke. “It’ll never happen." -- Scott Lynch

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Scott Lynch
